backgrounds.name: Acolyte
backgrounds.description: You have spent your life in service to a temple or religious organization.
backgrounds.equipment: Holy symbol, prayer book, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, common clothes, belt pouch with 15 gp
backgrounds.feature: Shelter of the Faithful - You can receive free healing and care at temples of your faith.

backgrounds.name: Criminal
backgrounds.description: You have a history of breaking the law and making contacts in the criminal underworld.
backgrounds.equipment: Crowbar, dark common clothes with hood, belt pouch with 15 gp
backgrounds.feature: Criminal Contact - You have reliable contact who acts as liaison to criminal underworld.

backgrounds.name: Folk Hero
backgrounds.description: You come from humble origins but are destined for greatness through heroic acts.
backgrounds.equipment: Artisan's tools, shovel, iron pot, set of artisan clothes, belt pouch with 10 gp
backgrounds.feature: Rustic Hospitality - Common folk provide you with simple accommodations and food.

backgrounds.name: Noble
backgrounds.description: You understand wealth, power, and privilege, coming from the upper echelons of society.
backgrounds.equipment: Fine clothes, signet ring, scroll of pedigree, purse with 25 gp
backgrounds.feature: Position of Privilege - Welcome in high society circles, common folk defer to you.

backgrounds.name: Sage
backgrounds.description: You spent years learning the lore of the multiverse in libraries and universities.
backgrounds.equipment: Bottle of black ink, quill, small knife, letter with unanswered question, common clothes, belt pouch with 10 gp
backgrounds.feature: Researcher - You know where to find information and can recall or know where to find most knowledge.

backgrounds.name: Soldier
backgrounds.description: War has been your life for as long as you care to remember as a warrior.
backgrounds.equipment: Rank insignia, trophy from fallen enemy, deck of cards, common clothes, belt pouch with 10 gp
backgrounds.feature: Military Rank - Your rank carries weight with soldiers and you can invoke it for simple equipment or assistance.
